Local Font Awesome 4.7

Place the official Font Awesome 4.7 distribution files here:

Expected structure:
- css/font-awesome.min.css
- fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff2
- fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff
- fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttf
- fonts/fontawesome-webfont.eot
- fonts/fontawesome-webfont.svg

Notes:
- This theme will automatically use css/font-awesome.min.css if present.
- If files are missing, the theme falls back to a harmless placeholder that hides `.fa` to avoid broken squares.
- Font Awesome 4.7 is MIT/SIL licensed; ensure files come from the official package.
